text: Abdrabbuh Mansur Hadi (ʿAbdrabbuh Manṣūr Hādī; Yemeni pronunciation: ; born 1 September 1945) is a Yemeni politician. He was a Field Marshal of the Yemeni Armed Forces. He was Vice President from 1994 to 2012. He became the second President of Yemen on 27 February 2012.Profile, bbc.co.uk; accessed 6 April 2015. In 2022, Hadi resigned, in a sign for a push for peace with Saudi Arabia. ==References== Category:1945 births Category:Living people Category:Presidents of Yemen Category:Vice presidents
title: Abdrabbuh Mansur Hadi
